We are happy to announce very extensive update of SolusVM Extended modules for WHMCS!

Thanks to your huge interest and valuable feedback, we were able to quickly improve each one of our SolusVM modules.
We added new features, fixed every reported problem and much more. Just take a look at the changelogs!

**Our Wiki has been already updated and contains information about new versions of the modules!**



**1. SolusVM Extended VPS For WHMCS**

Module allows you to automatically provision virtual servers to your customers. With SolusVM Extended VPS For WHMCS your clients will be able to conveniently manage virtual servers from your own WHMCS client area!


**Changelog:**

- **Added VNC Console**
- Added TUN/TAP, PAE and Boot Order into the client area (with possibility to hide)
- Changed files structure - ajax is handled from includes directory
- Fixed bugs with ajax and https redirection
- Source code fixes and improvements
- Fixed bug with changing root password
- Added possibility to add numeric values to usernames e.g.: usernameprefix-1
- Fixed bug with admin area 'Shutdown' functionality
- Fixed bug with admin area 'Mount ISO' functionality
- Added display of node in the admin area
- Added optional classic layout in the client area
- Implemented two templates: clientarea-simple.tpl and clientarea.tpl
- Added possibility to hide DNS Manager For WHMCS buttons
- Added more texts to translate in the language file
- Implemented new feature: Send Email Templates After Server Creation Based On Type: 'OpenVZ Virtual Server', 'Xen PV Virtual Server', 'Xen HVM' and 'KVM Virtual Server'. Possible variables: {$service_custom_field_rootpassword}, {$service_custom_field_vncip}, {$service_custom_field_vncport}, {$service_custom_field_vncpassword}
- Skipped TUN/TAP on KVM virtualization
- Skipped Load and Memory graphs on KVM virtualization

**2. SolusVM Extended Cloud For WHMCS**

Module allows your customers to create and manage their own virtual servers from your WHMCS client area! Owing to SolusVM Extended Cloud For WHMCS your clients will be able to e.g. add, remove, upgrade or rebuild virtual servers according to their needs.


**Changelog:**

- **Added VNC Console**
- Added TUN/TAP, PAE and Boot Order into the client area (with possibility to hide)
- Changed files structure - ajax is handled from includes directory
- Source code fixes and improvements
- Fixed display of help popup
- Fixed bug with changing root password
- Added display of node in the admin area
- Added more texts to translate in the language file
- Fixed bug with unlimited values configuration
- Skipped TUN/TAP on KVM virtualization
- Skipped Load and Memory graphs on KVM virtualization

**3. SolusVM Extended Reseller For WHMCS**

SolusVM Extended Reseller For WHMCS is a great solution for every SolusVM server owner who have their own resellers. Our module allows you to automatically create and provision ready products for your resellers. Products consists of specified server resources which can be further sold to customers of your resellers!

**Changelog:**

- Changed files structure - ajax is handled from includes directory
- Added possibility to define Media Groups in Module Settings (SolusVM API does not provide function to fetch Media Groups list and this is the reason why this is a text box instead of dropdown with readable names)
- Fixed display bugs
